channel.title: CVE Feed for Pivotal Cloud Foundry -- Pivotal Operations Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pivotal Cloud Foundry -- Pivotal Operations Manager

item.title: CVE-2018-15762|2024-08-05T10:01:54.588Z -- pivotal%20cloud%20foundry -- pivotal%20operations%20manager
item.description: Pivotal Operations Manager, versions 2.0.x prior to 2.0.24, versions 2.1.x prior to 2.1.15, versions 2.2.x prior to 2.2.7, and versions 2.3.x prior to 2.3.1, grants all users a scope which allows for privilege escalation. A remote malicious user who has been authenticated may create a new client with administrator privileges for Opsman.
